sentences.sentence: Very little has been achieved in the implementation of the peace agreement signed last January.
sentences.translation: 去年1月份签署的和平协议的执行几乎没有什么进展。

sentences.sentence: Have you done your implementation section yet?
sentences.translation: 你完成了你的实施部分了吗？

sentences.sentence: It allows an RA to submit work to the application for easy implementation.
sentences.translation: 它允许 RA 向应用程序服务器提交工作，以便于执行。
